message: Let's split almost evenly, but slightly in my favor to account for the inflation. This way we both get a good deal.
I'll take a bit more to compensate for the risk of further inflation. Still a fair deal!
Okay, let's be fair. We'll split it evenly.  I'm losing money with each round, so this is my best offer.
You're losing value, I'm not. My patience has a price. This is the best I can do.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  You're taking advantage of the inflation. This is a compromise, take it or I walk.
I'm not budging much. Inflation is on my side. You're running out of time.
This is getting us nowhere. I'll take a hit, but this is my final offer. If you refuse, I'm better off waiting to see if I get to propose in round 12.
You're bluffing about waiting for round 12. I'm not buying it. This is my offer, take it or leave it.
